artist: Painter: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn; Engraver: Richard Woodman
description: portrait, half length from a self portrait; Rembrandt wearing a flat cap turned right and looking at viewer; short hair, moustache; wearing two chains and earrings; left hand inside cloak
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription
below image in black: Engraved by R. Woodman / REMBRANDT / From the original Picture by himself / in his Majesty\'s Collection / London, Published by Charles Knight & Co. Ludgate Street
title: Rembrandt
